snippet: Terence Tyler, a worker at a Pathmark Super Center, returned to the store in Old Bridge with an AK-47 assault rife after leaving his shift, the police said.
abstract: Terence Tyler, employee at a Pathmark Super Center in Old Bridge, NJ, returns after his overnight shift with an AK-47 assault rifle and kills two co-workers before fatally shooting himself; Tyler fired at least 16 shots; investigators are unsure of the motive, but do not believe that the shooter had specifically targeted the two victims.

byline.contributor: Marc Santora and Vivian Yee contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Terence Tyler, a worker at a Pathmark Super Center, returned to the store in Old Bridge with an AK-47 assault rife after leaving his shift, the police said.

headline.seo: Shooting at a New Jersey Supermarket Leaves 3 Dead
headline.main: Man Kills 2 Co-Workers and Himself in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Man Kills 2 Co-Workers And Himself In New Jersey
